mapper.select: SELECT c_name, image_path, introduce, sell, a.num goodsCount, a.c_id cId FROM t_order a LEFT JOIN t_commodity b on a.c_id = b.c_id where order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT order_id, a.affirm_time affirmTime, a.order_state orderState, e.user_name userName, e.phone phone, d.shop_name shopName, d.address address, sum(price * a.num) orderAllCost, sum(a.num) orderAllGoodsCount FROM ( t_order a LEFT JOIN t_commodity b ON a.c_id = b.c_id ) LEFT JOIN t_shop d ON a.shop_id = d.shop_id LEFT JOIN t_user e ON a.user_id = e.user_code where order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY a.order_id, a.affirm_time, a.order_state, e.user_name, e.phone, d.shop_name, d.address
